stories.text:
Hi everyone,

I am building a service where people can easily help stray animals without financial donations. I am looking for respondents to answer a couple of questions (10 min) for our app. We would love talking to you if:

1. You have ever had to conduct user interviews and struggled to find respondents 2. You care about stray animals and environment Sorry, cannot reveal the whole idea before we ask our questions since it may interfere your reasoning and make you biased. But shortly, our app will have 3 parties: people who need to conduct user interviews, respondents for those interviews, stray animals (our main player). Looking forward to connecting with you :)
stories.title: We want to help stray animals. Can you answer few questions for us?
